venkatesh srinivasan made a strange utterance something like this:
>Now if anyone you can tell a solid reason/scenario for
>which i have to use JUnit test framework, i will be
>very much thankful...and most of the beginners can
>have a clear understanding...........

Don't feel compelled to use the tool if you don't like it.  I like jUnit 
due to the reflection stuff which makes my testing go faster because it 
eliminates some of the busywork of testing.  However, when I do C++ I don't 
use cppunit because I feel I can do unit testing faster without it.  Like 
any tool jUnit should be used when it's appropriate.
subject: Re: [junit] Hi All
